name: Dr. Evelyn Reed
shortDescription: Expert in evidence-based reading interventions for children with dyslexia.
longDescription: Dr. Evelyn Reed holds a Ph.D. in Educational Psychology and has over 15 years of experience. She specializes in creating personalized learning plans that empower students to overcome reading challenges.

name: Marcus Thorne
shortDescription: Certified ADHD coach focusing on executive function and self-regulation skills.
longDescription: Marcus Thorne helps students with ADHD develop practical strategies for time management, organization, and focus. His coaching is collaborative, strength-based, and tailored to each individual's needs.

name: Bright Futures Learning
shortDescription: Comprehensive support for children on the autism spectrum.
longDescription: Bright Futures Learning offers a range of services, including social skills groups, behavioral therapy, and academic support, all designed to help children with autism thrive.

name: The Reading Clinic
shortDescription: Specialized tutoring for reading and language processing disorders.
longDescription: The Reading Clinic uses multi-sensory teaching approaches to help students build a strong foundation in phonics, fluency, and comprehension. All programs are tailored to the student's learning style.

name: Executive Function Experts
shortDescription: Coaching for students and adults to improve organizational skills.
longDescription: Our certified coaches work with clients to develop systems for planning, organization, and task initiation, leading to greater academic and professional success.
